description:
##Summary
on the website page http://mifos.org/resources/marketing-resources/#top
all documents are written in English.

##Goal
Your tasks will consist in translating three documents in FRENCH this is: Mifos X Business White peper, Mifos Initiative Brochure and Mifos X Data Sheet.
it would be necessary to train so that one can understand in the simplest way possible by the populations which are not of French origin like the French of West Africa.
Then you will have to make a training video in French.
name: Mifos Ressources- Marketing ressources
